name: EggPlus
description: EggPlus provides a decentralized financial asset that rewards holders with a sustainable fixed compound interest model by using its unique EAP protocol. EggPlus Auto-Staking Protocol (EAP) is a new financial instrument, which makes staking easier, more efficient and also provides the highest stable cryptocurrency return for $EGGPLUS holders A simple and safe way to get paid. When purchasing of $EGGPLUS, it will be auto-staked and compounded in your wallet, no transferring of token to website or claiming proceeds manually. You just need to wait for the $EGGPLUS reward provided by EAP. It is the easiest way to get returns on your investment in DeFi
